'''Clay''' is a SWAT leader.

==History==
Clay led the team that was taking down a drug trafficker. He gave the plan to the team and told Andy and Maya just to wait until they were called in, if they needed them at all. Then the team went in. They successfully arrested the ringleader, though one police officer was shot in his vest.

==Career==
He is a SWAT leader with Seattle SWAT.
